channel.title: Sailing Skill? WTF!
channel.description: A lot of stuff has been floating around youtube and even runescape but i want the people from mopar to vote... do you think it is possibly for PS to have the ""Sailing SKill"" every one says its going to be.. but do u think PS will have it first or RS?

not going to be a skill

item.title: Sailing Skill? WTF!
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:9, topic:296250”][quote author=Lin link=topic=392275.msg2920627#msg2920627 date=1250725044]

Sailing would be fuckin gay.
[/quote]Not really. It’d be another exciting, pointless skill. Think about it. You build your ship, and the better your ship, the farther out you could go. Then you could meet up with other ships, cross over, and PK, etc… while having someone keep your ship alive. Kind of like Pest Control.

Basically we will be turning into pirates?

Well, mods were talking about it in Mod Mmg chat earlier while Mod Stevew was in there. Steve didn’t leak anything, but like 3-4 mods were talking about it. There still is no confirmation, but hints and people talking about it so often makes it seem almost obvious it might be that. It’ll be the same: try and get the new supplies for the skill before anyone else and make a shitload of money before everything dies down. THEN you train the skill yourself :).[/quote]
hey i was in that cc, did you see someone who’s name started with lame?

Read full topic

item.title: Sailing Skill? WTF!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:7, topic:296250”][quote author=Newty link=topic=392275.msg2920588#msg2920588 date=1250723239]
Sailing would be fuckin gay.
[/quote]Not really. It’d be another exciting, pointless skill. Think about it. You build your ship, and the better your ship, the farther out you could go. Then you could meet up with other ships, cross over, and PK, etc… while having someone keep your ship alive. Kind of like Pest Control.[/quote]

Basically we will be turning into pirates?

Well, mods were talking about it in Mod Mmg chat earlier while Mod Stevew was in there. Steve didn’t leak anything, but like 3-4 mods were talking about it. There still is no confirmation, but hints and people talking about it so often makes it seem almost obvious it might be that. It’ll be the same: try and get the new supplies for the skill before anyone else and make a shitload of money before everything dies down. THEN you train the skill yourself :).

Read full topic
